meanings.definition: A person or team that wins a competition or contest.
meanings.sent1: The winners of the race received shiny medals.
meanings.sent2: The soccer team celebrated their victory as winners of the tournament.
meanings.sent3: The winners of the spelling bee were all smiles and cheers.
meanings.sent4: In the game of life, she always positioned herself to be among the winners.
meanings.sent5: The winners' joy was contagious, spreading throughout the crowd.

meanings.definition: The act of winning or being victorious.
meanings.sent1: The feeling of being winners filled their hearts with happiness.
meanings.sent2: Winning the lottery brought unexpected joy to the winners.
meanings.sent3: The winners of the raffle danced around in excitement.
meanings.sent4: The winners' determination and hard work paid off in the end.
meanings.sent5: The sound of applause echoed in the room, signaling the winners.
